data.message: Can i confirm the truck is still at west bridgeford? I know it was there earlier and not due to leave until 8pm but ive had a phonecall to say that its apparently been cancelled and left early?

replies.message: Hi Sharnie, sorry for our late reply, hopefully you managed to get down to see it :) #holidaysarecoming

I was in Nottingham on Wednesday 16th December 2015 and I was at Coca Cola Christmas Truck at Asda Store West Bridgeford and it was NOT cancelled and it was they until 8pm. I enjoy myself and I was with my two friends who work for Coca Cola Christmas Truck. 

Mo in Nuneaton and Coca-Cola Loyal Fan 

#holidaysarecoming
